You\'ll get 0.25 marks for per solve in blue\n

Realizing the significance of problem solvers in the current International job market, the Computer Science and Engineering department of Daffodil International University has initiated some academic incentives for the promising problem solvers of DIU. As they are already struggling to keep going with problem-solving and it consumes most of their time, it’s not always possible to maintain both sides with dedication and finally achieve something big. So, we’re going to start a new era where problem solvers will get proper support from the department so that they can serve the country with their skills and uphold the prestige of our Department and University.\n To know more about incentive criteria and marks, click the button below.
